name: Into the Crypt
description:
In a world of heroes chosen by gods and goddesses, knights sworn to protect their royals and pprophecies to fulfill, you... are a simple adventurer. You may not be a hero of legends, but you still have to eat.

In Into the Crypt, you play as an ordinary adventurer who accepted a quest to slay some evil undeads. You are alone in this. No magic, no god's blessings. Just you, your sword and your shield. Try to get as far as posible, kill as many as posible and collect all the treasure you can in procedurally generated dungeons.
